text: Ishtadanam is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by Remesh Kumar and starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Innocent in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/ishtadanam-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar as Constable Sathyapalan Thambi * Innocent as Advocate Dharmapalalan Thambi * Thilakan as Constable Viswabharan * Harisree Ashokan as M. K. Maniyan * Salim Kumar as Unnikuttan * Zeenath as Saleena Dharmapalalan * KPAC Lalitha as Shakunthala Dhanapalan * Nedumudi Venu as Dhanapalan Thambi * Kalpana as Stella * Praseetha Menon as Gowri * T. R. Omana as Manikyamagalathu Unnikuttiyamma * Bindu Panicker as Uma Sathyapalan * Jagadish as Anathakrishnan Thambi/Aravindan * Kuttyedathi Vilasini as Nani * Nandhu as Anirudhan * Suma Kanakala as Anitha Varma * Manka Mahesh as Prasanna *Kollam Thulasi as Advacete *Kalashala Babu ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Ishtadanam
